meanings.definition: A smaller center within a larger urban area.
meanings.sent1: The city had many subcenters where people could shop and socialize.
meanings.sent2: Subcenters are important for providing services to local communities within a big city.
meanings.sent3: The subcenters in town were like little villages within the bustling city.
meanings.sent4: In the urban jungle, subcenters are like hidden oases of calm and convenience.
meanings.sent5: I always get lost in the subcenters of the city, but I love exploring them.

meanings.definition: To establish or develop smaller centers within a larger urban area.
meanings.sent1: The city council decided to subcenters new areas for better community development.
meanings.sent2: Urban planners aim to subcenters neighborhoods to improve accessibility for residents.
meanings.sent3: The mayor joked that he wanted to subcenters mini-cities within the city.
meanings.sent4: By subcentersing various districts, the city was able to enhance local economies.
meanings.sent5: The developers worked tirelessly to subcenters vibrant hubs in the heart of the metropolis.
